Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows people to communicate over a distance using sound.
The student can show through the drawing how a string telephone works, using cups and string.
The student can depict the transfer of sound from one cup to another through the string.
The student can include details to show that the device uses sound to send messages.
The student can display an understanding that the string must be tight for the sound to travel effectively.
The student can illustrate people using the device to communicate from different locations.
